name: Maven
body:
maven
=====

personal maven repository

add this config to your pom.xml
```xml
<repositories>
    ...
  	<repository>
		<id>github</id>
		<url>https://raw.github.com/khan/maven/master/releases</url>
	</repository>
    ...
</repositories>
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
